title: [Maaghara Tower, Alcove]
description: Branching tendrils sprout out of the ceiling and grow downward, splitting into fine, thin fibers as they go.  Any movement of the tendrils--by touch or breeze--sets them softly ablaze with internal flashes of light.  The floor is covered with soft, damp detritus.  The cloying smell of compost and decay wafts upward from the floor.
